la 2028 olympics

skills

graphic design ui / ux brand identity


timeline

january 2023 - may 2023

overview

a project in my type & image course. each student was assigned a host city of the olympics, and tasked with creating a visual identity system to represent it. i was given los angeles, and chose three words to be the basis of my designs: inviting, diverse, and kinetic.

initial research

the olympics present an interesting design challenge as you are not only designing for the host city; you are designing for the entire world. you have to properly represent your host city while also making visiting countries feel welcome.beginning with the city of los angeles, i wanted a visual identity that would be bold, bright, inviting to the people that lived there, and those who would be coming for the first time. after a lot iterating, i ended up incorporating aspects of la into the final logo, and elements that would invite the rest of the world in.
